lore.i: Your blood chills when you see your friend. You've seen his face so many times, but now it seems different. Your friend's large, watery eyes no longer appear human.

innsmouth-look.entry: Draw one Ally card and return it to the box. Then draw another Innsmouth Look card.

lore.i: Looking into your own family's history, you discover a line of your ancestry that descended from the small fishing village of Innsmouth.

innsmouth-look.entry: You may gain up to three Clue tokens. For each Clue token you choose to gain, draw another Innsmouth Look card.

lore.i: You wake up after dreaming of a dark, submerged city. Shadowy figures floated everywhere, and the entire ocean was teeming with activity.

innsmouth-look.entry: All monsters with the plus sign dimensional symbol, regardless of special movement abilities, move to an adjacent street area, location, or vortex, following the path with a black movement arrow. Then draw another Innsmouth Look card.

lore.i: In the dimmest corner of your mind, you hear a faintly echoing call. Something is moving across the water.

innsmouth-look.entry: All monsters with the plus sign dimensional symbol, regardless of special movement abilities, move to an adjacent street area, location, or vortex, following the path with a white movement arrow. Then draw another Innsmouth Look card.

lore.i: Each time you pass the mirror, the thought occurs to you, "Do I dare look? How deeply do I dare gaze into my own eyes?"

innsmouth-look.entry:
Choose 1 of the following:
1. Draw 1 additional Innsmouth Look card and you are Cursed.
2. Draw 2 additional Innsmouth Look cards.
3. Draw 3 additional Innsmouth Look cards and you are Blessed
